content:
How do I express that I want to restrict the use of a particular crate in my project to less than a particular patch version? I'm hoping to do the following but I still see 1.0.91 being used.

syn = "<1.0.91"
1.0.91 does not match "<1.0.91". Do you have two versions of syn in your tree?
Otherwise you could get resolved to something pre-1, while the rest of your dep tree goes newer.
I don't want 1.0.91 to be used, I want to ensure only versions less than that are used
Why do you not want 1.0.91 to be used? Also i you add a version req to say 1.0.91 and any other crate depends on it you will get an error that is impossible to fix for users of your crate.
